Tiffany Sutherland, District Registrar

Ms. Liz O’Connell-Gates, School Administrative Assistant

About the Registrar’s Office

This office is the information hub for current and former BHS students’ educational records. We generate copies of official transcripts and duplicate diplomas and process a variety of forms pertaining to: concurrent enrollment, early graduation and permission to work. In addition, we process social security forms and verify the accuracy of former students’ educational status for employment purposes.

Links on this page enable you to obtain copies of official transcripts, duplicate diplomas, work permits, concurrent enrollment forms, etc. If you don’t see what you need, email us at bhsregistrar@berkeley.net.

*****

Current Student Official Transcripts Request Link: Transcripts/Records Request Form

(BHS student email must be used)

Use this link to have official transcripts mailed to colleges, summer camps, etc.

For unofficial transcripts, please contact your assigned counselor or Mrs. Tiffany Sutherland at tiffanysutherland@berkeley.net

Former Student Transcript/Diploma/Records Link: Former Student Records Request Form

Allow 5 to 10 business days processing time. We process documents sooner if we can.

Important: Provide your photo ID, mailing address(es), email address(es) and phone number when placing your order.

Note: Per school protocol, we do not email official transcripts and/or duplicate diplomas to former students.

Note: We do not work with a third parties like Parchment.

Education Verification Request

When conducting a background check for a former student you will need to provide the student’s full name at time of attendance (maiden name), date of birth and the year the student was last in attendance. Your request cannot be processed without all pertinent information; you can email your request to bhsregistrar@berkeley.net.

Request a work permit here: Statement of Intent to Employ a Minor and Request for a Work Permit

When school is in session, pick up work permit forms in the Registrar’s Office, D173, or email completed forms to workpermits@berkeley.net.

Please allow 5 business days for processing.

Note: We process work permits during summer break.

Links to Concurrent Enrollment Forms:

Peralta Concurrent Enrollment, Tilden Prep Concurrent Enrollment Form, Other Concurrent Enrollment Form.

A Student may receive NO more than 10 credits per semester (Fall/Spring/Summer). Students will need to consult and get pre-approval from their assigned counselor before course(s) can be taken for high school credit and placed on the student’s transcript.
